::Savanna::

She heard the voice on her commlink.
"I will wait for you then."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia set his comm back to Savanna's individual frequency. "I 
> appreciate your response, one of your leaders have contacted me and 
I 
> have landing clearance, I could use an escort to your base to be on 
> the safe side."
> 
> The spider didn't know his new associate, she could be a 
transracist 
> Predicon hater with a short temper, a shoot first ask questions 
later 
> attitude, and a taste for Predicon mechfluid.
> 
> The thought scared him until he realized he was beating himself at 
> his game. Psyche warfare working it's finest in his head.  This 
task 
> was to important to worry about his fears, He was sure rhe was 
> harmless, what'a the worst beast mode she could have. She sounded 
> like a little kittycat.
>
